language.description: Output language for memory summaries. Options: 'auto' (follow input), 'zh' (Chinese), 'en' (English), or any language name.

includeDefaultPaths.description: If true, ingest OpenClaw workspace root *.md and workspace/memory/*.md by default.

extraPaths.description: Extra directories/files to ingest Markdown from.

filterScheduledSystemMessages.description: Filter large system-injected scheduled payloads (e.g., cron-delivered reports) before conversion to memU conversations.

scheduledSystemMode.description: How to handle matched scheduled system payloads: event (keep compact event marker), drop (remove), keep (original behavior).

scheduledSystemMinChars.description: Minimum message length to classify a system envelope as a scheduled payload candidate.

mode.description: Retrieval mode. fast: vector-only retrieval without LLM sufficiency checks. full: memU progressive retrieval with route_intention and sufficiency checks.

contextMessages.description: When mode=full, number of recent chat messages to pass as retrieval context before current query.

defaultCategoryQuota.description: Default category result quota for memory_search when categoryQuota is not provided in tool call.

defaultItemQuota.description: Default item result quota for memory_search when itemQuota is not provided in tool call.

outputMode.description: Tool output mode for memory_search. compact: returns minimal fields for model context. full: returns full JSON envelope including scores/model metadata.
